# bulkmail

This small Dancer app is used for sending bulk emails.

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgUGFydGljaXBhbnQgQSBhcyBBdXRob3JcbiAgICBQYXJ0aWNpcGFudCBCIGFzIEJ1bGttYWlsIGFjY291bnQvV2ViIEFwcFxuICAgIEEtPj5COiBTZW5kcyBCdWxrbWFpbCBhcyBpc1xuICAgIEItPkI6IFJlYWQvUHJlc2VudCBtYWlsXG4gICAgQi0-PkE6IFJlY2VpcHQgKyBsb2dpbiBsaW5rXG4gICAgQS0-PkI6IFNlbGVjdCBSZWNpcGllbnRzLCBGcm9tIEFkZHJlc3NcbiAgICBCLT4-QXBwcm92ZXI6IE5vdGlmaWNhdGlvblxuICAgIEFwcHJvdmVyLT4-QjogQXBwcm92ZSBtYWlsaW5nXG4gICAgQi0-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgUGFydGljaXBhbnQgQSBhcyBBdXRob3JcbiAgICBQYXJ0aWNpcGFudCBCIGFzIEJ1bGttYWlsIGFjY291bnQvV2ViIEFwcFxuICAgIEEtPj5COiBTZW5kcyBCdWxrbWFpbCBhcyBpc1xuICAgIEItPkI6IFJlYWQvUHJlc2VudCBtYWlsXG4gICAgQi0-PkE6IFJlY2VpcHQgKyBsb2dpbiBsaW5rXG4gICAgQS0-PkI6IFNlbGVjdCBSZWNpcGllbnRzLCBGcm9tIEFkZHJlc3NcbiAgICBCLT4-QXBwcm92ZXI6IE5vdGlmaWNhdGlvblxuICAgIEFwcHJvdmVyLT4-QjogQXBwcm92ZSBtYWlsaW5nXG4gICAgQi0-)

## Install podman buildah toolchain on ubuntu

```bash
sudo apt-get update -qq
sudo apt-get install -qq -y software-properties-common
sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:projectatomic/ppa
sudo apt-get update -qq
sudo apt-get -qq -y install buildah runc slirp4netns podman
```

## or ubuntu 20.04 (does not yet have a ppa)
```bash
. /etc/os-release
sh -c "echo 'deb https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/kubic:/libcontainers:/stable/xUbuntu_${VERSION_ID}/ /' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/devel:kubic:libcontainers:stable.list"
curl -L https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/kubic:/libcontainers:/stable/xUbuntu_${VERSION_ID}/Release.key | sudo apt-key add -
apt update
apt install podman skopeo buildah
```

## build the container

```bash
./build.sh
```

## start the container

```bash
podman run -d --rm -p 3000:3000 -v .:/root --name builmailer localhost/bulkmail
```
